column6: My very favorite lipstick of all time
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
column14: This light silvery neutral pink "lights up" my face and leaves a light pink stain when the finish wears off so that I can go through a casual day without having to reapply.  A gloss that can be carried easily in one's purse would be the way to refresh when you are out and about.  That's because the one drawback of this product is that it is sensitive to heat and quite delicate, so you would not want to jostle it around in a purse. It is exceptionally moist and luscious.  The color L56 "Rosy Pearl" is the perfect color for me.  I have a fair to medium complexion and I generally avoid bright or dark colors.  If you want something that has slightly more color, you might choose Champagne.  I use Champagne when I wear brighter pinks or reds that call for a bit more lip color.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
column14: It’s hard to find a good lip color without seeing it in person. This color just WOWS! It has a little bit of a peach/rose gold color to it with such a great shimmer that it’s almost like a metallic. Very elegant and my very favorite new color! I am a blue-eyed blonde with a ruddy complexion and this color is just incredible. Stays on and feels so creamy. I just ordered a second one because when you find a great color you need to purchase more in case it sells out!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
column14: This is a great frosty color to put over lipstick. It’s more nude than peach so it’s pretty over anything neutral I think. I am glad I purchased it. I would not wear it alone but if you had full lips it would be beautiful

column6: This is a Long Wearing Lipstick, But, Drying
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
column14: It is a long wearing lipstick, but drying on my lips.  I am 61 yrs and I have always loved shimmer.  I wish this had more moisture.  I find I have to use something else on top of it.  I hope they consider putting argan oil into the making of the lipstick.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
column14: Metallic/ piny shade...beachy- summer shade! Ive been using this brand for over 10 years because its PREMIUM and it works!!!! You do not need to re apply or touch up....it stays on all day! ( even after you eat!!) It comes in about 100 shades. Great price point and coverage! It does not pill or separate on lips. It stays smooth and colorful- I will ALWAYS buy L'paige! Thank you!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
column14: I haven’t been able to find a good frosted lipstick in a long time

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
column14: The color is a very pale, pale pink. The photo online leads you to believe it would be a little darker. It is not.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
column14: Love the product. Great moisturizing lipstick. Will order again from this seller. Arrived in a timely manner.
